transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji sir very good morning. Greenwich Energy Solution mein baat kar rahi hai.
Customer: Haan ji mam haan ji.
Executive: Mam sir main Vidhi baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART team se. Kal aapka ek concern receive hua tha hume. 
Hmm. API ko lekar right. To hamare executive Mr. Bhanu ne aapko sari cheeze guide ki thi uske according.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To kuch rest reh gaya sir because aapka feedback hume receive hua tha as a not satisfied.
Customer: Correct hai. Achcha. Haan ji. Sir unhe quotation bhejiye abhi isko karna hai na.
Executive: Kya karna hai sir sorry?
Customer: Unhe shayad quotation bheji hai na. To quotation bhejiye ek baar na quotation bhejiye.
Executive: Sir maine already share kara di thi unse. Aapke mail pe aaya hoga. Haan ji.
Customer: Mail kaun sa satisfied aaya hai na wo aapke WhatsApp number pe aaya hai jo aapka primary number hai na 44.
Kya hai number?
Executive: Us WhatsApp number pe not satisfied aaya. To agar aapko koi problem aap face kar rahe ho service related to aap mujhe bata sakte ho.
Customer: Nahi aisa to kuch nahi hai shayad wo sir ne kiya hoga unko pata nahi hoga na actually coordination nahi baitha hoga. Sir actually bahar hai.
Executive: Okay. To main ye jaanna chah raha tha na ye kis kaun se mail pe kiya aapne mail quotation?
Executive: Okay just a second.
Executive: Sir aapki primary mail ID pe hi gaya hoga waise to.
Customer: Okay theek hai main ek baar check karta hu na. Haan ji and jin mam se kal sham ko baat hui thi na.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Unse bhi maine discuss kiya tha to unhone bola ki theek hai main sir se discuss karke morning mein aapko update karungi.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: And second cheez mujhe ye confirm karni thi matlab aapke yaha pe bahut sare products updated hai but mostly sare product to aapke out of stock mark hai sir.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: To in sab product mein deal nahi kar rahe ho kya aap abhi?
Customer: Nahi wo sab mein nahi kar rahe hain matlab jo kar rakhe hain out of stock.
Executive: To jo bhi product aapne out of stock kiye hai na unko aap apne end se delete kar dijiye because as a buyer ye bhi ye sare product aapke out of stock hi show kar rahe hain. And total 49 products hai aapke.
Customer: Haan out of stock hai chalo right. Haan to unko aap delete kar dijiye yaha se and in future kabhi add karna hoga to hum wapas se add kara denge.
Customer: Sure sure. Theek hai. Okay. Thank you. To ye abhi abhi matlab aisa koi major problem nahi hai na aapka?
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa kuch nahi hai.
Executive: To main ye wala concern close kar do please is baar satisfied kijiyega sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: And apne sir se please baat kar lijiyega.
Customer: Okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received 'not satisfied' feedback request.

- Wants to know the mail ID for quotation.

- Products are out of stock.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed quotation was sent to primary mail.

- Advised to delete out-of-stock products.

- Executive will close the concern.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- quotation, out of stock, products, feedback
